channel.title: Making a portal teleport a player to a certain place
channel.description:
Ok, so i made these two portals that take you to shops and training. i only started on one portal to make it take you to shops. i did the case and all that stuff, but when i compile it says error with the stuff i put in. i have ddspeced source so i dont know if you do something different to add cases.
Please help

item.title: Making a portal teleport a player to a certain place
item.dc:creator: @x_dreamer_x x dreamer x
item.description:
@x_dreamer_x wrote:

uhh when i removed it i got 100 errors…

                                  }
		if ((objectID == 6551) && (objectX == 2920) && (objectY == 10224)) {
			triggerTele(2920, 10224, 0);
			sM("You have been teleported to the shop");
		}

fixed it still dosent work…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2009, 03:47:45 pm[/size][hr]ii give up this stupid portal dosent work…im so confused…and dont know how to do this…

Read full topic

sM(“You have been teleported to the shops.”);
}

item.title: Making a portal teleport a player to a certain place
item.dc:creator: @x_dreamer_x x dreamer x
item.description:
@x_dreamer_x wrote:

ok well i took an old training place and made it tele you to shops. this is what i have so far…

}
if ((objectID == 6551) && (objectX == 2920) && (objectY == 10224)) {
triggerTele(3347, 3680, 0);
sM(“You have been teleported to the shops.”);
}

but what does the trigger tele do, do i have to change that or something

Read full topic
item.source: Making a portal teleport a player to a certain place

item.title: Making a portal teleport a player to a certain place
item.dc:creator: @xxrazorscapexx xxrazorscapexx
item.description:
@xxrazorscapexx wrote:

search “makeglobalobject” in client.java untill you find a pretty large list and then add another object

makeGlobalObject(****, ****, 6551, 0, 10);
* = coords typical portal ID ^

now you need to search something like “green dragons” to get to the teleport part.

you can either add another teleport or edit another one

eg.}
if ((objectID == 6551) && (objectX == ****) && (objectY == ****)) {
if (combatLevel >= ***) {
toX = ****;
toY = ****;
} else {
sM(“Type your own message here”);
sM(“Type your own message here”);

then make sure you close and save then compile[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2009, 02:38:41 pm[/size][hr]if you would like to talk to me abit more about it then come to my server: jojo-scape.no-ip.org (xxrazorscapexx is my old server)

Read full topic

}
if ((objectID == 6551) && (objectX == 2906) && (objectY == 9708)) {
triggerTele(2866, 9944, 0);
sM("****************************************");

this is in client i also had to add this

makeGlobalObject(2908, 9708, 6551, 0, 10);

to the global object section (search “makeglobalobject”) hope i helped

item.title: Making a portal teleport a player to a certain place
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

    case (portal ID):
        teleportToX = ####;
        teleportToY = ####;
        break;

Is what I use for portals.
